DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study determine patient birthing experience differ family-centered traditional cesarean method . We hypothesize family-centered cesarean method lead unique personalized cesarean birthing experience without increase risk adverse neonatal maternal outcome document traditional cesarean .
DOC.detailed_description: Patients consent randomized one two delivery method research coordinator , resident physician , charge nurse nurse day plan cesarean section . Several variable interest collect via electronic medical record within OR . Additionally , assessment patient satisfaction conduct follow delivery . Questions 11-item questionnaire ask patient study coordinator , resident physician , nurse charge nurse .
DOC.criteria: Women ≥18 year age Women plan cesarean section ≥38 week gestation Singleton fetus Reassuring fetal status Women urgent emergency clinical situation medical staff care patient determines obtain consent would interfere patient 's clinical care Patients decline consent participate Patients anticipate heavy intraoperative bleeding ( bleed disorder , placenta previa , suspect placenta abruption , etc . ) Known maternal comorbidities could impact neonatal wellbeing ( e.g. , uncontrolled diabetes , etc . ) Chorioamnionitis prolonged rupture membrane ( ≥18 hour duration ) Known fetal anomaly BMI ≥45 kg/m2 Estimated fetal weight < 2000 gram
